title: DATS treatment schema
description: Process, part of a study, consisting in exposing participants to the study to different conditions or group those participants into different categories based on specific criteria and compare their outcomes

agent.description: a property used to specify the nature of the perturbation or intervention used in the study

intensity.description: a property used to specify how acute the perturbation is

concomitance.description: a property used to specify if more that one perturbations are applied at the same time to the same subject

input.description: a property to specify the dataset used as input

output.description: a property to specify the dataset resulting from applying the technology

order.description: a property used to specify the rank in which perturbations are being applied to study subjects
